titleStmt.title: Essayes. By Sir William Corne-Waleys the younger, Knight
Essays
titleStmt.author: Cornwallis, William, Sir, d. 1631?
Olney, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by S. Stafford and R. Read] for Edmund Mattes, at the signe of the Hand and Plowgh in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 1 was printed by S. Stafford, vol. 2 by R. Read (STC).
Signatures: A⁴ B-N O⁴ N⁴ O-2N.

"A second part of essayes" has separate title page with imprint "London printed for Edmond Matts, dwelling at the signe of the Hand and Plough in Fleet-street. 1601"; register is continuous, but part 2 is sometimes found separately or with later editions of the first part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
